title: Single of The Week: Peter Bjorn and John
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/05/peter-bjorn-and-john-1.jpg)](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/05/peter-bjorn-and-john-1.jpg)

With last week’s single of the week diverging from the usual new release formula, we thought; why not try it again? And so we did, and might I say It created something rather beautiful. This week’s single of the week is _Amsterdam_ by the frankly wonderful **Peter Bjorn and John**. Breezy, laid back and oddly grove filled; this is the tune you need to live your week by.

[Check The Myspace](http://www.peterbjornandjohn.com/)

[Download Peter – Bjorn & John ft Spec Boogie- Amsterdam (Loosie remix)](http://goldengazelle.com/Brig/peter%20bjorn%20and%20john%20and%20SPEC%20BOOGIE-amsterdam.mp3)

excerpt.full: With last week’s single of the week diverging from the usual new release formula…..
